content: Another lovely and hopeful day ahead! Go on, ask me anything~!
Your guide Goodman is here! Life, travels, socials... I can walk you through all of it. So, what would you like to know this time?
Eat well, sleep well, and don't forget to water your crops... Hmm, is there anything I can help with?
How's everything going on your planet? If you ever need help, you can come to me anytime!
Hello, I'm your guide, Goodman. Feel free to ask me anything you'd like to know~!
